top.title: Zelensky due at Downing Street for high-level Ukraine talks
top.summary: Sir Keir Starmer will also welcome the leaders of France and Germany as Europe looks to respond to a US-led push for a peace deal.

top.title: Thousands flee Thai-Cambodia border after deadly clashes
top.summary: At least five people have been killed in the most serious confrontation between both sides since July.

top.title: Jeremy Bowen: Syria feels lighter without the Assads' crushing weight - but now there are new problems
top.summary: One year into his rule Syria's leader has won over Trump and much of the West, but at home people know his weaknesses.

top.title: Elon Musk's X bans European Commission from making ads after €120m fine
top.summary: The EU regulator had fined the social media platform over its "deceptive" blue tick badges.

top.title: Trump says $72bn Netflix-Warner Bros deal 'could be a problem'
top.summary: The planned deal would cement Netflix in its position as the world's biggest subscription streaming service.

top.title: Japan is facing a dementia crisis – can technology help?
top.summary: Elderly people aged 65 and over now make up nearly 30% of Japan's population.
